## Navigator.addNavigationPolicy() method

Adds a navigation ruleset to this Navigator.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addNavigationPolicy(policy: INavigationPolicy<any>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  policy | [INavigationPolicy](./blockly.inavigationpolicy.md)<!-- -->&lt;any&gt; | A ruleset that determines where focus should move starting from an instance of its managed class. |

**Returns:**

void
